oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2009-05-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 5, 2009. Professional songwriters with student co-writers performing songs they have written together during the course of the school year. Hosted by Sarah Buxton.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Performances include Dreams, Dreams, Dreams (Steve Nelson with Wrenne French & Katie King); Troublemaker (Candace Corrigan & Janne Henshaw with Joshua Peoples); Snow (Jerry Vandiver with Chaylee Maguffin & Bethany Warren); Mr. 2 x 4 (Bill Maier with Sam Blevins); Where Is Daddy? (Gary Culley with Helen Riley Lazenby); Out My Window (Jeff Dayton with Welton Pride); Slumber Party (Jason Duke with Anna Kate McGimsey & Chelstin Wildun); I Need You (John Feld with Lexi Van Meter); Space Mission (Moriah Domby with John Philip Cost, Paul Davis, Nick Jones, & Matt Piper); All I Know Is You, Lord (Belinda Smith with Rachel Parsons); The Girl in the Hallway (Gary Michael Smith with Sal La Rosa); Just Like Them (Larry Wayne Clark & Cassidy Lynn with Elizabeth Houghton); Heaven Has a Gardener (Jason Carson & Misty Rae with Callie Herrmann); I Wish I Had a Mini Dog (Jack Norton with Julio Padron); Coffee Shop Rock (Sandy Ramos with Jack Carey & Cade Clayton); Ouside My Window – (Sarah Buxton) "
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
